item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @Locksta Locksta
item.description:
@Locksta wrote:

Hamachi isn’t recommended, I don’t bother downloading it because not many people use(that’s just my opinion though). Making a Hamachi server might be a bonus if alot of people use it, you can always try. A normal server(I’m guessing you mean just using a No-IP server) is usually quicker and easier for me. You can’t get a virus if you scan everything, most sources and clients on Moparscape are safe as I have never gotten a virus by anything posted on Moparscape.

Read full topic
